::GoldenEye::

She nodded to Phobia and transformed into eagle mode.  She took off 
into the sky and started looking around.  She didn't see any maximals 
nearing thier area. She circled the area and checking her scanners.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Phobia was shocked at the results of the voting, but he above all 
else knew

hand.
>

hurt bad
> and we have two options, What's closer, the predacon ship or the 
alliance
> base?" The spiderbot knew that the first priority of the group was 
to assure
> the leaders survival.
>

>

sending
> Starscream would be to dangerous with his possible injuries and 
Bludgeon
> covered his own tail when the going got dangerousand would do so 
again when

need your

bot on

change for

>

> 
> "Starscream, I know your reputation don't even think you can 
manipulate me,
